import{combineReducers}from"redux-immutable";import{reducer as recommendReducer}from"../pages/discover/c-pages/recommend/store";import{reducer as playerReducer}from"../pages/player/store";// 对所以组件的 reducer 进行融合
var cReducer=combineReducers({recommend:recommendReducer,player:playerReducer});export default cReducer;
